post.title: Example Event Organized by Leme
post.excerpt: The Extra-Legal Governance in Global Perspective conference brings together scholars interested in research that addresses how we conceptualize various types of governance (extra-legal, criminal, rebel, hybrid, etc.) and how such governance shapes and is shaped by conflict, illicit markets, regime type, political parties and elites, and law enforcement.
post.content: The Extra-Legal Governance in Global Perspective conference brings together scholars interested in research that addresses how we conceptualize various types of governance (extra-legal, criminal, rebel, hybrid, etc.) and how such governance shapes and is shaped by conflict, illicit markets, regime type, political parties and elites, and law enforcement.
